result.execSummary:
The defendant Darren E Brumfield was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: Consecutive to any other sentence.  TIME SERVED.
Court waived all costs. Defendant is indigent.

records.addlTxt: Bail refund packet.  vp
Bail Notice mailed to surety on 02/10/17.  vp

Statements made as to Sentencing by both counsel and the Defendant.

THE COURT ORDERED THE Defendant to serve 1 DAY in the House of Correction (HOC), consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 1 day TIME SERVED. The Court WAIVED all costs. Defendant indigent.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant waived rights and pled GUILTY.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered. Parties are prepared to proceed with Sentencing.
State's Requested Jury Instructions received and filed with the court.
State's Motion in Limine received and filed with the court.
Received and filed with the court.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties are prepared to proceed with Jury Trial scheduled for 02-08-2017 at 09:00 am in Branch 45.  COURT WILL RETAIN THE FILE.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury Trial scheduled for February 8, 2017 at 09:00 am.  Final Pre-trial scheduled for January 6, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Newly appointed. Defense awaiting discovery from previous attorney.  Status Conference scheduled for September 15, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court with attorney Steven Rees Wiechmann.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LNR
Counsel informed Court there has been a breakdown in communication.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Case adjourned for status of counsel on 08/01/2016 at 1:30 pm in Branch 45.   All parties are notified that effective August 1, 2016 this case will be assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45,  in Room 615 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Darren E Brumfield in court.  Steven H Glamm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.37  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
